attributes.action: law to ban the use of palm oil in all manufacturing & consumer products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Forcing an all out ban on the use of palm oil will help end the devastation happening to the rainforests in Borneo, vast areas are being destroyed for the sake of palm oil plantations, this is killing the Orangutan's & their habitat, a ban would force manufactures to evaluate where the products they use come from & the enviromental impact this causes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
